title: Interview: Phil Spencer wants to see Xbox 360 games running on PC
text:
Interview: Phil Spencer wants to see Xbox 360 games running on PC 
Published By: WPCentral.com - Today 
Among other discussions, Xbox head Phil Spencer said during a recent interview that he'd like to be able to play Xbox 360 games on PC. Since... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
